remarks: Axiom of ` e. `-Induction (also known as set induction).  An axiom of Intuitionistic Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory.  Axiom 9 of [Crosilla] p. "Axioms of CZF and IZF".  This replaces the Axiom of Foundation (also called Regularity) from Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Oct-2018.)
statement:
ax-setind $p |- ( A. a ( A. y e. a [ y / a ] ph -> ph ) -> A. a ph ) $.
$d a y $.
$d ph y $.
